programme.title: Four Weddings
programme.desc: Four Texas friends who are about to become brides, put their friendship to the side and judge each other's weddings for the chance to win a surprise honeymoon in paradise.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: Corey is a young gay man who is just getting back on his feet after being homeless. He has dreams of getting back into college and finding a serious relationship, but he needs to make huge changes if he is going to live his dreams - or live at all.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: After Dr. Procter postponed Corey's bariatric surgery and increased his weight loss target to 25 pounds, Corey tries to stay focused on his diet. A successful blind date provides a welcome boost of confidence before Corey's impending surgery approval.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: Jasmin is a young single mom who weighs 604 pounds and has lost almost all of her independence. Her mother was recently diagnosed with MS, and Jasmin knows that she must get bariatric surgery so she can take care of her mom and her 7-year-old son.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: With her weight spiraling, Tammy makes a life-altering decision. Amy finally gets a taste of the life she's always wanted, but, unfortunately, it's short-lived. An emergency surgery has repercussions for Chris.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Tammy is back from rehab, and Amy kisses her freedom goodbye as she comes to a drastic decision regarding her sister. With his bariatric surgery on the line, Chris tries to shed the weight he's gained but is shocked when he and Tammy step on the scale.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Amy is upset that Tammy's new nurse isn't pushing her enough. Tammy has started slacking, and the family worries about what could be the cause. Chris and Tammy clash when he confronts her about the new man in her life.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: When Amy tries to get her house in order, she must confront some demons from her past. Tammy admits to a few cheat days just before her first doctor's appointment since rehab. Chris steps on the scale that could change his life.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: After Tammy's bad doctor's appointment, Chris comes down on Amy for enabling her sister. The family worries Tammy's new boyfriend is leading her down the wrong path. Amy's idea of having a meet and greet to help Tammy has its own set of problems.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Tammy must see a new therapist, but things don't go the way she'd hoped. Amy wants to lose her excess skin, but she gets bad news at the plastic surgeon's office. Chris faces the scale. If he's below 400 pounds, his surgery is on.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Chris faces the ultimate weigh-in to get approved for bariatric surgery. With Tammy's weight at a standstill, Amy and Michael make a life-altering decision. The family's fears about Tammy's choice in partners are realized.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life

programme.title: Sister Wives

programme.desc: The Game Wardens patrol the beach, lake and land, as summer is in full swing. Wardens educate a dog owner about leaving pets in the sun. An under-age drinker tells too many lies. Wardens inspect novice jet skiers on a busy recreational lake.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: As summer winds down in Texas, game wardens enforce the law. While patrolling the Rio Grande, Game Wardens Gould and Hickerson spot people attempting to enter the United States illegally, and Game Warden Inman responds to a call from a hunting club.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Warden Price is on a mission to arrest out-of-state hunters with warrants for trespassing and hunting on private property. A young angler is haunted by his past and is taken to county jail, and Warden Richards questions a pair of dishonest fishermen.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Warden Cummings deals with an angry man who blew a stop sign. Warden Boone helps chase a trio of armed robbers on the run, and Warden Inman investigates a group of suspected deer hunters for trespassing.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In Llano County, a jet skier's life is spared after an explosion on the water. When a man fakes his own death, Warden Herchman and Stapleton join forces to track him down, and a man is found trespassing while fishing.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A check for a fishing license takes an unlikely turn and an abandoned car is found on private property. Wardens Sellers and Roraback are in pursuit of illicit hunters, and zebra mussels are suspected of being illegally transported in Llano County.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: As Warden Richards reminisces on his career during the last day on the job, he races to rescue a cow being attacked by a pack of hunting dogs. At the academy, new recruits wrangle a gator, while anglers are caught illegally fishing.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Wardens Richards and Roraback attend an accident.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Mallory Mitchell and Jeremy Lindsey intervene when an overloaded boat and unruly jet skiers put lives at risk. Game Warden Randolph McGee investigates reports of a wild hog being tortured, while other game wardens round up a willy alligator.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A slew of poached birds is discovered on an abandoned boat, changing a missing person's search into a hunt for a hiding poacher. Game Wardens Mike Boone and Lauren Iles rescue a tangled 12-foot gator, while multiple boats are inspected on Lake Limestone.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In Liberty County, Game Warden Jake Noxon investigates a family for illegally keeping a pet deer, and farther south an alligator roams a garage. Game Warden Mike Boone joins forces with local police to track down armed suspects after a robbery.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Warden Randolph McGee assesses a major gasoline spill in the local water system then tracks down a trash dumping culprit. Young jet skiers are confronted, and Game Warden Mike Boone helps relocate an alligator circling a dock.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: On Sam Rayburn Lake, Game Wardens Morgan Inman and Austin Cryer discover that a brave citizen rescued passengers from a sunken boat. A suspected poisoning could be the cause of numerous dead doves, and alligators are found on school property.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: When a drunken man wreaks havoc on Sam Rayburn Lake, Game Wardens Randy Sovall and Sean Reneau deal with the aftermath. Game Warden Mike Boone tracks down the culprits responsible for an illegal dumpsite, and hooks a gator residing in a family's pond.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: During wildfire season, Game Warden Dustin Delgado catches people throwing out lit cigarettes and stops them in their tracks. Game Warden Cynde Aguilar helps hunt down the criminal of a high-speed chase, and a call is made about a gator lurking in a pond.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Warden James Cummings arrives at the scene of a domestic dispute, only to discover the man has a warrant out for his arrest. During water patrols, a fisherman is caught empty handed, and a couple with their baby are kayaking without life jackets.

programme.desc: Racers are in the home stretch of the Points Competition. Ryan Martin is determined to claim the top spot in his home state, but Team X and Team NOLA are hot on his heels and ready to do whatever it takes to knock him down.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: On the Gulf of Mexico, a routine inspection turns treacherous for Game Warden Carmen Rickel and the Marine Tactical Operations Group. Warden Kyle Hadley wrangles a rattlesnake found in a home, and underaged boaters are busted for alcohol on deck.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Suspicions flare when stray bullets strike an elderly couple's home and their neighbors are questioned. Game Wardens Raj Ataya and Clint Caywood rush to help an injured boater, and an overnight kayak patrol reveals campers throwing caution to the wind.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: During a routine hunting license check, husband and wife Game Wardens Ben and Chelsea Bailey discover illegal drugs. Trespassers get caught in a dangerous restricted area, and Warden James Cummings races to track down a man threatening self-harm.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Matt Kiel and Michael Serbanic race to confront reckless jet skiers wreaking havoc at a boat ramp. A rogue ATV rider tries to lie his way out of a trespassing charge, and a crabber turns hostile when caught without a fishing license.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Foolhardy speedsters run afoul of wardens on a nighttime stakeout mission. Game Warden Mike Boone investigates reckless gunfire endangering life and property, and Game Warden Chelsea Bailey crosses paths with a wanted man during a routine safety check.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Mike Boone and James Noxon question a felon suspected of illegally hunting with a firearm. Hunters are tracked down and interrogated after a suspicious sighting on private property, and a late-night shrimp boat search uncovers illegal fish.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Morgan Inman and Justin Eddins interrogate a group of hunters suspected of trespassing and theft. Lifeless ducks are found floating mysteriously in Port Aransas, and wardens hit the water before dawn to bust clandestine shrimpers.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Deep in the woods and bayous of Louisiana, Wildlife Agents protect the state's resources. A crab fisherman is caught stealing dozens of traps, a hunter crosses state lines with an illegal deer, and Agents rescue an injured bald eagle.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: In Jackson Parish, a reckless hunter is investigated for shooting down a highway. Meanwhile, Agents stake out a man suspected of two illegal deer kills, duck hunters are confronted for harassment and a crowded boat parade ends with citations.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: In Southern Louisiana, Lt. David Nunez and Sgt. Austin Arteaga investigate a group of bird hunters on opening day of Teal Season. Later, a repeated offender is busted for taking immature crabs and a late-night deer decoy leads to a hunter in handcuffs.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: While using the LDWF's 'spy-in-the-sky' drone, Agents track down a boat captain breaking the law in Plaquemines Parish. A family of shrimpers is investigated for pulling oversized nets, and two feuding fishermen are suspected of being under the influence.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: As a storm rolls in over St. Tammany Parish, Cpl. Blaine Wagner and Cpl. Rick Clark assist in a search and rescue mission for a missing fisherman. Agents confront a repeat offender for harassing hunters and a felon is caught with an illegal firearm.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: In Ouachita Parish, a trespassing investigation leads to a dicey encounter and multiple seizures of deer. Agents confront a group of duck hunters who are spotted killing non-game birds, and health code violations are found during a routine oyster patrol.

programme.sub-title: In the Eye of Hurricane Ida

programme.desc: The Poseidon Gold need gold to pay for their operation while Jacqui and Andrew find gold in Queensland.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters
programme.desc: Justin recruits his fiancée Becky to save him from financial ruin. The Fire Crew face deadly reptiles and a snapped suspension in search blue fire opal. The Cooke Brothers go 21 metres under, desperate to get their hands on the first opal of the season.

programme.title: Bering Sea Gold
programme.desc: Top contenders Shawn and Vernon battle it out for their final haul in the face of a storm ready to knock them off the ice. Zeke risks one last move. Kris hopes to pull enough to set up his summer.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: During a routine hunting license check, husband and wife Game Wardens Ben and Chelsea Bailey discover illegal drugs. Trespassers get caught in a dangerous restricted area, and Warden James Cummings races to track down a man threatening self-harm.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Matt Kiel and Michael Serbanic race to confront reckless jet skiers wreaking havoc at a boat ramp. A rogue ATV rider tries to lie his way out of a trespassing charge, and a crabber turns hostile when caught without a fishing license.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: Two 747s collide on the tarmac in Tenerife in what remains the single deadliest aviation accident of all time.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Jamie's new B.C. crew struggles with a mangled trailer on a blind corner. When Colin slips up on a big recovery in Alberta, Jamie's brother must take over the job, even though he's a rookie on the rotator; Brandon steps up to a new role.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: When a lumber truck and diesel tanker collide, the flaming wreckage is the biggest recovery of Colin's career. As snowstorms pummel the Coquihalla, Al Quiring heads up the hill. In freezing rain, John faces off against a mangled tractor.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Having been accused of murder, Brennan is on the run from the FBI, with help from her father Max.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a high-powered divorce lawyer with a lot of enemies. They discover that the attorney's wife and assistant have been hiding crucial evidence. Meanwhile, Brennan adjusts to life on the run.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A man falls 52 stories and his body goes missing after it hits the ground. With no body to process, the CSIs must treat this strange development as a missing persons case.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The most exclusive jewellery auction of the year ends abruptly when an appraiser is killed during the event. The investigation takes an emotional turn when the CSIs must confront one the greatest tragedies in human history, the Holocaust.

programme.title: How the Universe Works

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: White dwarfs are small, dead stars with a dangerous side, capable of exploding into supernovas and destroying planets; new research suggests these mysterious phenomena may be the key to understanding the universe itself.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Transporting the gear of Formula E's ten electric-powered racing teams to cities around the world across more than 50,000 total kilometres in the greenest way imaginable is no easy task. For air transport, DHL uses Boeing 747 or 777 aircraft.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The C-2 Greyhound's design allows it a flexibility and access that few other fixed wing craft possess. For the U.S. Navy, it provides critical logistics support, flying 1,000 miles in a matter of hours and transporting high-priority cargo.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Follow the Stargazer carrier on its latest quest, taking to the sky to launch the Pegasus rocket delivering specialized weather satellites designed to detect the magnitude and intensity of hurricanes.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Baffinland Mines needs to get equipment to a remote mine in Nunavut to support shipping operations for the summer and have hired one of Volga-Dnepr's Ilyushin-76 (Il-76) aircraft to take on this timely operation.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The German Air Force is overhauling their entire fleet of outdated cargo planes, and replacing them with Airbus? Latest state-of-the-art military aircraft, the A400M, which can haul massive loads.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The Twin Otter is found around the world in jungles, deserts, mountains, the Arctic and anywhere rugged reliability and short-take-off-and-landing are needed. Powered by twin turboprop engines, the Twin Otter manoeuvres like a bird.

programme.desc: Investigate aspects of safety when a Greek ferry en route between Athens and the Island of Paros smashes into a rock and sinks. Killing 80 people, the crash has left many wondering how the vessel hit a rock that raises 25 metres out of the sea.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: A freight train rumbling through the calm suburb of San Bernardino, California, derails and crashed, destroying homes and taking lives. Less than two weeks later a pipeline, weakened in the cleanup of the derailment, explodes.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: When a hijacked Ethiopian Airlines flight runs out of fuel near the Comoros Island, a pilot must save the lives of the passengers. The pilot, who has been hijacked twice before, must rely on his skills as the plane plunges toward the sea from 31,000 feet.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: In 1977, two fully loaded jumbo airliners suffer 583 casualties despite never leaving the ground at foggy Los Rodeos Airport in the Canary Islands.

programme.desc: On August 2, 2005 Air France flight 358 burst into flames when it skidded off the runway in Toronto during a raging thunderstorm. More that 300 passengers and crew had only seconds to escape the burning plane.

programme.desc: Smoke starts filling the cabin and a bizarre shower of white sparks hits the windshield during a calm British Airways flight to Australia in 1982. Seconds before crashing into the Indian Ocean, the failing engines roar back to life.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: As Moe and Lizzy reveal they are expecting a second child, parolee Spencer announces he's expecting his first.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Two strays lead Lizzy and Villalobos employees on a wild goose chase. A grandmother comes to Villalobos looking for another canine companion, but her dog Daisy has other plans. And, Tania pursues her dream to write a children's book.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A Pennsylvania prison offers to take twenty dogs from Villalobos. An emaciated pit bull fights for its life. A potential adopter travels from Michigan to meet a dog that stole her heart, but then is shocked when she comes face to face.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tania struggles to rescue a puppy that is hiding underneath a shed. A potential adopter comes to Villalobos hoping to find a companion for her dog, and she's only interested in seeing hounds. A beloved employee learns that he's finally off parole.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: The crew helps pregnant Lizzy find an injured, older dog roaming the Ninth Ward; a long-time employee gets some exciting news about his future; Mariah helps a pooch battling tumor surgeries and is in need of a forever home.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When two lovable pups are dropped off at Villalobos' dog boutique, the VRC crew is determined to get them back to good health. Then, a young woman comes in searching for a canine perfect to experience the Big Easy lifestyle with her.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and Earl face a decision about an elderly hound needing medical attention at an Alabama shelter. An abandoned, aggressive dog is found roaming a trash-filled backyard, while Lizzy and Moe help a pair of potential adopters find their fur-ever friend.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia takes in a pit bull that was rescued from terrible conditions in Kuwait. An adopter travels from Michigan in hopes of finding a new best friend. When a stray dog ends up at Villalobos, Earl is determined to track down its owner.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When Kenani is in a serious motorcycle accident, Tia and the Villalobos crew must band together to ensure him a speedy recovery. A retired Marine visits the center to find a forever fur-friend, while Lizzy and Earl rescue a hound found in a parking lot.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia races to rescue four dogs from a rural shelter in Louisiana from euthanasia. Mariah and Toney give a scared, shy dog a shot at a forever home, while a unique canine gets a chance at a Pennsylvania prison dog program.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Mariah searches for a homeless woman needing to surrender her beloved pit bull. Tania and Toney find the perfect pair of dogs for former adopters, while Lizzy prepares her favorite rescue for a forever home after dealing with his medical issues.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Toney and Earl rescue an aggressive dog found tied up in front of an abandoned home. Tia and Lizzy escort a pit bull to its potential forever home in New Jersey, while Mariah helps a deserted canine struggling with neurological issues.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and M2 welcome back a couple who want to reunite their adoptee with her former best friend. Mariah and Tony discover a hound in desperate shape, while Mariah does everything in her power to nurse VRC's first Louisiana rescue back to health.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: The Villalobos crew celebrates 200 episodes and recount precious memories. From Mariah's beauty pageant days, to memorable rescues, like Walter and Buffy. They reminisce on what it was like to film and the highs and lows of living the rescue life.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes after Tia and M2 agree to take two emaciated hounds from a rural shelter. Mariah and Lizzy give two special dogs a happily ever after while working through the chaos of the global pandemic, and M2 reveals an exciting new life chapter.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and M2 face tragedy after agreeing to take two emaciated hounds from a rural shelter. Mariah and Lizzy give two special dogs a happy ending while working through the chaos of the global pandemic, and M2 reveals an exciting new life chapter.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Facing new challenges, the VRC crew gets creative: Tia leads a virtual meet-and-greet with a lovable hound, Mariah helps the parolees channel their talents for a fundraiser, and a lucky pit bull learns a new skill for life with an outdoorsy couple.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: VRC is at its limit when the amount of rescues and drop-offs rise. Lizzy and Toney travel to a remote part of the city to save a trio of orphaned dogs in a dire state, veteran tenant Lil Rocky faces a cancer scare, and a litter of puppies are welcomed.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When thirteen-year-old PJ Grant is found dead from a single gunshot wound to the head, Lt. Joe Kenda assumes it's a suicide. But when the physical evidence doesn't add up, it opens the door to a world of possibilities-from hatred to human sacrifice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When uninvited guests crash a barrio birthday party, violence erupts—leaving Enrique Urrutia dead and potentially sparking a gang war. To keep the peace, Lt. Joe Kenda must crack an unwritten code of silence and bring Enrique's killer to justice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When Keith Andrews is killed, a man steps forward claiming he did it in self-defense-but Lt. Joe Kenda has his doubts. Then... Civil rights icon Gretchen McRae is found decomposing in her house. And that's not even the biggest secret on the premises.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.sub-title: We Kill the Ones We Love
programme.desc: A drive-by shooting leaves Van Terry dead; to crack the case, Lt. Joe Kenda must put his faith... in a burglar. Then...Cherie Bradley and her ex-boyfriend Anthony Carroll are found dead, and it's up to Kenda to discover which of their relatives did it.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When Cheryl Brantner's children find her dead in her bathtub, Lt. Joe Kenda must decide if this was a soapy accident or something worse. Then, a gathering of local tattoo artists turns ugly, leaving Philip Titus dead and the only suspects his peers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When young Iraq War veteran Curtis Ashley ends up dead, Lt. Joe Kenda has to solve the slaying of a seemingly innocent victim using just a mere shred of evidence and his keen awareness of the criminal mind.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Vietnam War veteran Charles Walker is found unconscious, after a stabbing attack so savage even 45 units of blood couldn't save his life. It's up to Lt. Joe Kenda to follow the bloody trail of clues and piece together the victim's last moments.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When Johnny Crawford is killed in his easy chair, police are perplexed to learn he may have been shot over a musical instrument. But as Lt. Joe Kenda digs deeper, it soon becomes clear the young man wasn't killed for his own sins...but someone else's.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a gunfight erupts at a local biker bar and claims the lives of two men, Lt. Joe Kenda must delve deep into the world of an infamous biker gang to determine if the cause behind the violent encounter was gang rivalry or something more personal.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: It's New Year's Eve weekend, and in the midst of the revelry Miguel Mendez is beaten to death outside a convenience store. Lt. Joe Kenda faces a challenging investigation, his only clues coming from a drunken witness and Miguel's strange injuries.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: George Ferribee, a loving son led astray by addiction, is found executed. When Lt. Joe Kenda learns the victim had recently been kidnapped, he assumes the crimes are related... but soon discovers things are much more complicated than he had expected.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda

programme.desc: A budding teen romance ends when the young man is shot dead on their first date leaving a startled girl as the key to the case. Then A man is dead, his young wife has fled, and Kenda must figure out if she was present for his suicide or his murder.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A meeting between two businessmen leaves one shot in the face. Things seem cut and dry until Lt. Kenda realizes the 'victim' could actually be the aggressor, shot struggling over his own gun. The key to the case lies in the deal they were discussing.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A loving, churchgoing grandmother is found stabbed to death in her apartment, leaving Joe Kenda to wonder what sort of monster could do such a thing. Then When Kenda investigates the mysterious death of a successful dentist, the case gets personal.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When two escaped inmates surface in Colorado Springs, it's up to Lt. Joe Kenda and his Fugitive Unit to bring them to justice. Then Police break up a domestic dispute and find a body in the bedroom.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a soon-to-be grandmother doesn't come home from work, her daughter knows something terrible must have happened and reports her missing. As the investigation unfolds, Lt. Joe Kenda realizes they could be dealing with a fledgling serial killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Events earlier in the day lead to a card game halted by gunfire and a young man's death. Also, when Lt. Joe Kenda responds to a double shooting, he and his team find themselves reminiscing.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A four-week-old girl is kidnapped, leaving her mother in anguish and police scrambling to find her. As days go by with no sign of the baby or demands for ransom, sergeants Joe Kenda and Robert Sapp fear she's been sold on the black market or worse.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A woman's mangled body is found beside a lonely stretch of highway. When the coroner suspects foul play, Kenda is called in to solve the second homicide case of his career.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: The discovery of a family home littered with corpses tasks Kenda with unspooling the paranoid obsessions of a diseased mind, and forces him to confront his greatest fear. Then a deadly beating a cheap motel illuminates the dark underbelly of love.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Blood evidence is used in investigating the shooting death of a firearms enthusiast.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a young army vet is found stabbed to death on his living room floor, suspicions quickly fall to a neighbor who was arrested during a nearby altercation. But when Kenda takes a closer look at the victim's love life, he realizes someone's been lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When affable ladies' man Michael Tittemore is gunned down in the dead of night, Kenda first sets his sights on the roommates who were present during the murder. But a shocking revelation will turn his attention to a far more nefarious band of suspects.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Kenda finds the bullet-ridden bodies of a middle-aged couple in a musty suburban house alongside the corpses of their two beloved pets. But the case is stuck in neutral until detectives discover an essential clue hidden behind an old wire birdcage.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A bystander receives a deadly head injury during a roadside altercation, but the stakes are raised when his body disappears from the scene. Then when a toddler is kidnapped for ransom, Kenda joins forces with an undercover team in a race against time.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: The murder of a young father stuns his close-knit community, but the investigation reveals a neighborly dispute turned deadly. Then when a house is besieged by mysterious gunfire, Kenda enlists a team of specialists to trace the bullets' origin.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Hardworking family man Douglas Warren stumbles into a downtown bar with a gunshot wound to the neck and bleeds out on the floor. To catch the killer, Kenda must conduct a risky sting operation and launch an interstate manhunt.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a drunken dispute at a biker bar turns deadly, Kenda must launch a manhunt for a pair of suspects who fled with a small boy in tow. Then a man is murdered in an onslaught of high caliber gunfire, but an unexpected break turns the case on its head.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: The body of a 72-year-old man is found in junkyard, stabbed 13 times and wearing nothing but his underwear and dentures. When investigators discover a trail of purchases made with the victim's credit card, they hope it will lead them to the killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Lt. Joe Kenda and his team investigate the scene of an apparent suicide, only to be forced to flee when they discover the house is booby-trapped. Then Kenda is nearly stumped when a group of teens discover human bones on the outskirts of town.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A young man is found gunned down outside his home after a day spent helping friends move apartments. Sgt. Joe Kenda and Det. John Anderson must determine whether the killer was a complete stranger, a barrio gang member, or a jealous lover.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Two teens stumble upon a woman engulfed in flames, leaving detectives to wonder just who in her inner circle could kill so cruelly. Then, when a college student is strangled in his home, Lt. Kenda must figure out which of his roommates is lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A hostage situation puts Sgt. Joe Kenda and his team to the test, as they try to save a family without getting shot themselves.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl is missing, sending Kenda's city into a panic. Who is responsible? Just when investigators think they've got a handle on what is going on, a cryptic letter to the District Attorney's office suggests the girl isn't the only victim.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A teenage party at the edge of the city turns horrific after the discovery of a woman's corpse. Detectives easily surmise that she was strangled with her own shoelace, but figuring out her identity proves difficult.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A soldier is stabbed to death at a drive-thru. Kenda's only clue is that this is somehow tied to a breakdancing competition. Then a 29-year-old man moves back to Colorado Springs, but at his welcome home party he winds up shot execution-style.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Sgt. Joe Kenda and his officers are facing off against a barricaded gunman when he gets an emergency call from his wife. Kathy winds up overhearing him being shot at, leading her to grapple with the terrifying realities of being married to a cop.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A woman is found in the mountains, naked and covered in blood. As Det. Joe Kenda digs into who she is and what happened to her, he uncovers a world of violence and sexual fetishes, culminating in perhaps the most intense interrogation of his career.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: The naked body of a vibrant young mother is found frozen solid in a deserted cemetery. When all leads dry up, the case runs cold. But years later, Kenda reopens the investigation and recognizes the sinister hallmark of a serial killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Soon after the lifeless body of Charlie Tuttle was discovered behind a locked bedroom door, his death was ruled a suicide. Six months later however, Kenda receives an unprompted confession that propels the case in a whole new direction.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: After a husband and wife are viciously attacked in their own home, Kenda is on the hunt for a troubled teen whose appetite for violence knows no bounds. Then an unprecedented discovery spurs police to open up a century old murder investigation.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A sharp-dressed pedestrian is shot in the back for unknown reasons. Chasing a promising lead, Kenda realizes he's barking up the wrong tree. Then when an impromptu argument turns fatal, a suspect's guilt boils down to his skill with deadly weapons.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When an Air Force veteran dies unexpectedly, Kenda and his team must determine if it was a tragic accident or premeditated murder. But before long, they discover that their clean-cut victim had a secret life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Hikers stumble onto the brutalized corpse of amateur boxer Johnnie Wilson, hidden beneath a pile of branches. Plagued by false starts and blind alleys, the case finally gains traction when investigators get their hands dirty.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: An unhinged divorcee with a score to settle initiates an armed standoff from the cramped confines of his trailer park. Then a disabled man is killed on the job, but Kenda's case hits a roadblock when forensic evidence is scrubbed from the scene.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Two best friends are gunned down on a dark residential street. When a string of disappointments threaten to derail the case, Kenda enlists the help of an old acquaintance.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A woman in red drops a dying man off at a firehouse and then vanishes. Police soon learn the victim is a contractor with a troubled personal life, but identifying the mystery woman is the hurdle they must overcome in order to bring him justice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a frantic 9-1-1 call reports an infant stopped breathing, Kenda and Walker must see if the daycare is to blame or the parents themselves. Then, Kenda works an execution-style shooting and is shocked to learn the victim is a kindly grandmother.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A young man is found dead behind the wheel of his taxi. With robbery seeming unlikely, Kenda and Gaenzle wonder if this was personal. Could this stem from a dispute at his other job as a radio DJ? A failing marriage? The possibilities seem endless.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.sub-title: Kingdom of the Polar Bears: Part 1
programme.desc: Veteran polar bear guide Dennis Compayre goes on a remarkable journey, providing a rare and intimate glimpse into the world of a polar bear mom and her newborn cubs as they leave the safety of their den for the first time.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.sub-title: Kingdom of the Polar Bears: Part 2
programme.desc: Veteran polar bear guide, Dennis Compayre watches as a mother bear teaches her young cubs to hunt and discovers how they are struggling to adapt to a rapidly warming Arctic.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Scientists uncover the complex and emotional lives of the ocean's most intelligent predators.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Sable Island, Nova Scotia, is home to the largest breeding colony of grey seals in the world. Using newly designed cameras attached to two female seals, we get an intimate look at the life of the grey seal.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Bald eagles are an exotic reminder of the wilderness that surrounded many of our cities' landscapes. These majestic predators epitomize survival. Their story is one of opportunism and adaptation in the face of a rapidly changing ecological landscape.

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: The remarkable story of a solitary wolf living against the odds and his close bond with renowned wildlife photographer Cheryl Alexander.

programme.title: Murder in Amish Country
programme.desc: When a young Amish wife is found murdered in her bed, police uncover a dark world they never imagine existed.

programme.title: Murder in Amish Country
programme.desc: When the body of a 9-year-old boy is found by the side of a rural highway it takes police two years to identify him. The mystery leads police on a chilling odyssey into a secretive community and hot on the trail of an Amish serial killer.

programme.title: Murder in Amish Country
programme.desc: Anna Borntregger has been dead for 10 years, so when her husband suddenly tells police he murdered her they don't know what to make of his confession.

programme.title: Murder in Amish Country
programme.desc: When Katie Gingerich is found murdered and disemboweled, even the most hardened police are shocked.

programme.title: Murder in Amish Country
programme.desc: Naomi Huyard never strayed far from home, so her sudden vanishing rocks her tight-knit community to its core. When detectives make an unspeakable discovery, they soon realize there's much more to the story than meets the eye.

programme.title: Murder in Amish Country
programme.desc: When a Mennonite family man is stopped for drunk-driving, no one could predict that it would expose a shocking underbelly of organized crime. Abraham Wiebe risks it all as a central figure in one of the largest criminal cases in Oklahoma history.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.sub-title: Cash Days: Another Brick in the Wall
programme.desc: OKC and Texas compete in an old school Cash Days race. Eight drivers from each state race for over $30,000 and the chance to prove that their state has the fastest racers in the country, but a sketchy road throws a wrench into the works for both sides.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: On the second night of Cash Days, 405 racers must match up and race, while still fighting to knock out the only remaining Texas driver. The sketchy road is still in play, and it becomes a tuner's game to see who can get down the street in one piece.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After dominating the track, the once-mighty kings of the street return to reclaim their roots. Feeling like drivers have gotten soft, Chief puts the 405 to test with the most important list shakeup ever. Chief and Murder Nova part ways.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chief, Dave, Ryan, Monza and Dominator battle for the number one spot as the list shakeup continues. Chief hopes to prove that his split with Shawn hasn't slowed him down. Ryan gets some advice from an unlikely source.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A horrifying crash brings a racer to terms that his racing days might be over. For the first time in list history, Chief and Shawn must find what it takes to win without the other's help.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A familiar face returns to the 405's list, bringing with him a new car with scary potential. Working on his own, Shawn tries to prove to his son he has what it takes to climb the ranks.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After a series of bad passes, Shawn is determined to get the Murder Nova driving straight again. Monza challenges Ryan Martin for the number one spot on the top ten list. Farmtruck and AZN put the Jeeper Sleeper up against a tuned-up BMW.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A horrific crash devastates the 405 as Kamikaze returns to defend The List against a new racer hoping to earn a spot. Shawn makes a big change in an attempt to turn things around and Ryan Martin wastes no time calling out Monza.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN bring back an epic third annual Daily Driver contest where racers show up with everything from a golf cart to a Corvette to compete for big stacks of cash.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The Daily Driver field is down to 18. With a new set of rules and a new road to race on, competition gets crazy. But only one driver will take home the cash prize.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: For the first time since it began, Big Chief throws out the Top Ten list. In the most intense racing in years, OKC drivers must now compete in a high-stakes qualifier for five spots on America's List.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chief and Ryan draw each other for the first race of the night to set the tone for the second round of America's List qualifiers. As drivers become desperate for wins on the cold road, an OG member of the 405 pushes his car too far.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The stakes are raised as drivers draw back-to-back races. Daddy Dave is undefeated, but Big Chief seeks to ruin his night.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A new challenge emerges as the 405 must race back the opposite direction down the road. Drivers rise and fall as they fight for the remaining slots of America's List.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The five OKC slots for America's List are almost set. Chief, Dave and Ryan have all solidified their spots. Murder Nova must conquer his toughest matchups to clinch one of the remaining spots.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The drivers draw chips to determine their next matchup. Many teammates find themselves facing off against each other, and no one's pulling any punches.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The first matchups kick off with even numbered drivers calling out the odds. Some drivers struggle to adapt to a new set of rules.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: With America's list up and running, the drivers start planning their climb to the top spot.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chief counts down the top ten craziest moments in Street Outlaws history.

programme.desc: A race in Las Vegas takes place.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings
programme.desc: Coming off a Team Attack win, Ryan Martin goes for two victories in one weekend. Bobby Ducote gives Jerry Bird a push into the second round, and Murder Nova suffers a catastrophic failure.

programme.desc: Team Attack heads to Arizona, where dry heat and desert dust tear up the blower cars. Jeff Lutz looks to make good use of borrowed wheels. In the finals, good sportsmanship comes into question.

programme.desc: Three competitors put their cars on the line for a chance to be the wheelman in a real-life high-speed chase.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: A Telsa, a '66 Impala Wagon and an S2000 try to outrun an elite team of pursuers in a real-life high-speed car chase. A wrong turn sends one driver over the edge, while another getaway ends in shockingly painful fashion.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: Competition heats up in the compound and the pursuers are taking prisoners. One driver learns a painful lesson, while the others run for their lives.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: A stunt driver, a drift instructor and an exotic car salesman get the chance to live their ultimate driving fantasy: wheelmen in their very own high-speed car chase. But for one getaway driver, fantasy quickly turns into a nightmare.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: Two confident young drifters arrive at the compound with a BMW E36 and a modded-out Mustang. The more experienced third driver has come teach these youngsters a lesson.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: Heavy rain transforms the compound into a wet-and-wild wasteland. A '55 dodge pickup, Nissan 240SX and a '94 Ford Taurus scour the compound for traction and an exit as the pursuers try to stop them at all costs.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: History is made at the compound when one getaway driver takes the pursuers on the longest run ever.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: Three all-wheel drive vehicles enter the compound looking for a fight.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: We take a ride on New Zealand's KiwiRail: the TranzAlpine, a five-hour journey across 223 kilometres, and Northern Explorer, an 11-hour trip through five regions of the North Island.

programme.title: Mighty Trains
programme.desc: After a $280 million restoration project, passengers can one again enjoy Ecuador's Tren Crucero flagship luxury train.

programme.title: Mighty Trains

programme.desc: When a couple is gunned down, a scrawled message leads police to suspect the crime may be related to drugs, even though there's no evidence the victims were involved in the drug trade.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: When Patricia Kimmi disappears from her home in Horton, Kan., evidence leads investigators to believe she will not be found alive.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: The discovery of the bullet-riddled bodies of Skyla Whitaker and Taylor Placker inspires panic among the community members of Weleetka, Okla.

programme.title: Valley of the Damned
programme.desc: When Dianne Hood is gunned down outside a community center in Prison Valley, no one can understand why anyone would want to murder the well-liked housewife; the answer involves betrayal, greed and obsession, in an infamous love-triangle murder plot.

programme.title: Valley of the Damned
programme.desc: When Lea Porter goes missing in Prison Valley, her family members set out to find her; their investigation leads to the discovery of the killer's true identity; as the killer evades arrest, Lea's brother devises a plan to make him confess.

programme.title: Valley of the Damned
programme.desc: The police encounter a bizarre murder case while investigating a deadly home invasion in which Jehovah's Witness Pam Candelario's body is found at the scene and her husband Ralph is brutally beaten.

programme.title: Dead of Winter
programme.desc: Kay Weden finds her mother murdered inside her home; then, investigators discover the frozen remains of Weden's boyfriend in the Blue Ridge Mountains.

programme.title: Dead of Winter
programme.desc: Noel Alkaramla, 21, vanishes just before Thanksgiving; investigators interrogate Noel's girlfriend and many others, but the answers can only be found in the icy depths of the Hudson River.

programme.title: Dead of Winter
programme.desc: A woman and her two young children go missing, then two other boys also disappear, prompting investigators to ask whether there's a serial predator on the loose in the wintry landscape of rural Missouri.

programme.title: Cold Blooded Alaska
programme.desc: Police search for two prison escapees before they can kill again (New!).

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: The true stories of people who have been attacked by random strangers, with camera footage from the scene and testimony from eyewitnesses (New!).

programme.title: Crimes Gone Viral
programme.desc: A couple watch helplessly through a streaming security camera as a man burglarizes their home; a woman inexplicably fires a gun into a house, then returns and tosses a flaming torch into it.

programme.title: Web of Lies
programme.desc: When a young Army veteran returns from war, his family is relieved to have him out of harm's way finally. But danger lurks closer to home when a brief encounter on a dating app leads to a devastating tragedy.

programme.title: Cold Blooded Alaska
programme.desc: Police search for two prison escapees before they can kill again (New!).

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: After a serious car crash, novelist Paul Sheldon (James Caan) is rescued by former nurse Annie Wilkes (Kathy Bates), who claims to be his biggest fan. Annie brings him to her remote cabin to recover, where her obsession takes a dark turn when she discovers Sheldon is killing off her favorite character from his novels. As Sheldon devises plans for escape, Annie grows increasingly controlling, even violent, as she forces the author to shape his writing to suit her twisted fantasies.

programme.title: Love Spreads
programme.desc: Tensions rise when members of an all-female rock band gather to record their second album.

programme.title: Downeast
programme.desc: A dive into the often ignored seedy underbelly of Maine combining crime, revenge and the hope for a new life.

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: After a serious car crash, novelist Paul Sheldon (James Caan) is rescued by former nurse Annie Wilkes (Kathy Bates), who claims to be his biggest fan. Annie brings him to her remote cabin to recover, where her obsession takes a dark turn when she discovers Sheldon is killing off her favorite character from his novels. As Sheldon devises plans for escape, Annie grows increasingly controlling, even violent, as she forces the author to shape his writing to suit her twisted fantasies.

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: Lifelong friends and now roommates, Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) are buried under a mountain of debt. When the electricity is turned off, they realize that desperate times call for desperate measures. They decide to make an adult film to raise some cash. Though they swear that having sex will not damage their friendship, their business proposition quickly turns into something much more.

programme.title: Zola
programme.desc: Zola, a Detroit waitress, is seduced into a weekend of stripping in Florida for some quick cash -- but the trip becomes a sleepless 48-hour odyssey involving a nefarious friend, her pimp and her idiot boyfriend.

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Crisis
programme.desc: A drug trafficker organizes a smuggling operation while a recovering addict seeks the truth behind her son's disappearance.

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: The Comedy Vaccine
programme.desc: The comic performs his fifth stand-up comedy special in Tempe, Ariz., focusing on COVID-19 and offering his views on mask culture, fatherhood and why 2020 was the best year to fart in public.

programme.title: Martin Eden
programme.desc: After Martin Eden meets Elena, he tries to achieve a place among the literary elite through self-education.

programme.title: Borg vs. McEnroe
programme.desc: It's the summer of 1980, and Björn Borg is the top tennis player in the world, dominating the sport both on and off the court. A powerful and rigorously disciplined player, there is only one obstacle in his pursuit of a record-breaking fifth Wimbledon championship: the highly talented but ferociously abrasive young American John McEnroe. With three days until the tournament begins, Borg trains religiously in his lavish Monaco home, aided by his coach and mentor Lennart and girlfriend Mariana.

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff
programme.desc: During the 1840s, six settlers and their guide are caught in a dangerous situation: They are lost, food and water are running out, and the surrounding desert threatens to claim them all. Meanwhile, their guide, Stephen Meek (Bruce Greenwood), refuses to acknowledge that they may be several weeks off-course. When a Native American (Rod Rondeaux) is captured, Emily Tetherow (Michelle Williams), one of the settlers, shields him from Meek's wrath, and he offers to lead the group to water in return.

programme.title: The Real Charlie Chaplin
programme.desc: Combining unheard audio recordings, dramatic reconstructions and personal archives, filmmakers Peter Middleton and James Spinney trace Charlie Chaplin's meteoric rise from the slums of Victorian London to the heights of Hollywood superstardom.

programme.title: Adam Sandler's Eight Crazy Nights
programme.desc: Davey Stone (Adam Sandler), a 33-year old party animal, finds himself in trouble with the law after his wild ways go too far. In keeping with the holiday spirit, the judge gives Davey one last chance at redemption -- spend the holiday performing community service as the assistant referee for the youth basketball league or go to jail. Davey thinks he's gotten off easy until he meets Whitey Duvall, the eccentric, elf-like head referee.

programme.title: Ain't Them Bodies Saints
programme.desc: A man (Casey Affleck) takes the fall for his lover's (Rooney Mara) crime, then four years later breaks out of prison to find her and their young daughter, who was born during his incarceration.

programme.title: The Hummingbird Project
programme.desc: Cousins Vincent and Anton are players in the high-stakes game of high-frequency trading, where winning is measured in milliseconds. Their dream is to build a straight fiber-optic cable line between Kansas and New Jersey, making them millions, but nothing is straightforward for this flawed pair. Anton is the brains, Vincent is the hustler, and together they push each other and everyone around them to the breaking point with their daring adventure.

programme.title: Mid90s
programme.desc: In 1990s Los Angeles, a 13-year-old spends his summer navigating between a troubled home life and a crew of new friends he meets at a skate shop.

programme.title: Adam Sandler's Eight Crazy Nights
programme.desc: Davey Stone (Adam Sandler), a 33-year old party animal, finds himself in trouble with the law after his wild ways go too far. In keeping with the holiday spirit, the judge gives Davey one last chance at redemption -- spend the holiday performing community service as the assistant referee for the youth basketball league or go to jail. Davey thinks he's gotten off easy until he meets Whitey Duvall, the eccentric, elf-like head referee.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Douglas Quaid (Arnold Schwarzenegger) is a bored construction worker in the year 2084 who dreams of visiting the colonized Mars. He visits "Rekall," a company that plants false memories into people's brains, in order to experience the thrill of Mars without having to travel there. But something goes wrong during the procedure; Quaid discovers that his entire life is actually a false memory and that the people who implanted it in his head now want him dead.

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Even More Funny Women of a Certain Age
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner Teri Hatcher joins the stage with some of the funniest women in comedy for one night of over-the-top, uninhibited standup.

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: An anthropologist (Stephen Tyrone Williams) awakes with a thirst for blood after an assistant stabs him with a cursed dagger.

programme.title: Free Fire
programme.desc: When a black-market arms deal goes outrageously wrong, Justine finds herself caught in the crossfire, forced to navigate through a warehouse full of trigger-happy madmen who are all hanging on for dear life.

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Neil Young: Heart of Gold
programme.desc: Shot over the span of two nights in the summer of 2005 at Ryman Auditorium in Nashville, Tenn., this Jonathan Demme concert film combines interviews with Neil Young and other band members with the premiere of various songs from the album "Prairie Wind." The concert film also features a special acoustic encore of older Young songs, as a special favor to Demme for the purposes of the film. Songs performed include "Far from Home," "Heart of Gold," "Harvest Moon," and "Comes a Time.".

programme.title: Smoke
programme.desc: Writer Paul Benjamin (William Hurt) is nearly hit by a bus when he leaves Auggie Wren's (Harvey Keitel) smoke shop. Stranger Rashid Cole (Harold Perrineau Jr.) saves his life, and soon middle-aged Paul tells homeless Rashid that he wouldn't mind a short-term housemate. Still grieving over his wife's murder, Paul is moved by both Rashid's quest to reconnect with his father (Forest Whitaker) and Auggie's discovery that a woman who might be his daughter is about to give birth.

programme.title: House of Sand and Fog
programme.desc: Reformed drug addict Kathy Nicolo (Jennifer Connelly) has her California coast house, which she inherited from her father, taken away by the county due to a misunderstanding about back taxes. The place is bought by Iranian immigrant Massoud Amir Behrani (Ben Kingsley), who intends to fix it up and sell it in order to provide a better life for his wife (Shohreh Aghdashloo) and son (Jonathan Ahdout). However, Kathy, desperate to get the house back, begins harassing Behrani so he will return it.

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Frank Serpico (Al Pacino) is an idealistic New York City cop who refuses to take bribes, unlike the rest of the force. His actions get Frank shunned by the other officers, and often placed in dangerous situations by his partners. When his superiors ignore Frank's accusations of corruption, he decides to go public with the allegations. Although this causes the Knapp Commission to investigate his claims, Frank has also placed a target on himself. The film is based on a true story.

programme.title: Savage
programme.desc: Torn between his biological family and the gang he now calls his own, a man has to make a choice.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: Los Angeles denizen Louis Bloom (Jake Gyllenhaal) survives by scavenging and petty theft. He stumbles into a new career as a cameraman and -- armed with a camcorder and police scanner -- begins nocturnal forays across the city in search of shocking and grisly crimes. When he catches the eye of a shopworn news director (Rene Russo) who welcomes the chance to raise her station's ratings, Louis goes to increasingly greater lengths to catch the "money shot.".

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.

programme.title: Victoria
programme.desc: Four local Berliners recruit a thrill-seeking Spanish woman (Laia Costa) to be their getaway driver for a bank robbery.

programme.title: She Hate Me
programme.desc: Fired from his corporate job, a man (Anthony Mackie) agrees to impregnate his ex-fiancee (Kerry Washington) and a slew of lesbians for money.

programme.title: Carmen Jones
programme.desc: Screen version of the musical "Carmen Jones," which adapted Bizet's opera Carmen for an African-American cast. A soldier falls for Dandridge, a seductive factory worker. The lovers flee after the soldier kills his sergeant, but Carmen's taunting faithlessness drives her lover to a crime of passion.

programme.title: Eyewitness
programme.desc: New York City custodian Daryll Deever (William Hurt) is a big fan of local news reporter Tony Sokolow (Sigourney Weaver), so he is intrigued when she shows up to cover a story at his workplace. There's been a murder in the office building, and Tony suspects that Daryll may have insight into the crime, a notion that he furthers to stay close to her. However, when those behind the killing begin to think that Daryll really knows something, they target both him and Tony to keep their secrets hidden.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, he's the culmination of decades of research, endowed with unprecedented strength, speed, stamina and intelligence. Known only as Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), his latest target is a corporation that plans to unlock the secret of his past to create an army of killers even more powerful than him. With help from a young woman, the elite assassin confronts revelations about his own origins in an epic battle with his deadliest foe.

programme.title: Safe
programme.desc: Luke Wright (Jason Statham) is a two-bit cage fighter, until the day he throws a fixed match. In retaliation, the Russian mob murders his family and destroys his life. Though alone and haunted by grief, Luke springs into action to save a Chinese girl (Catherine Chan) from the same gangsters who killed his family -- and lands in the middle of a high-stakes war. The girl is no ordinary child; she's a math prodigy who holds in her head a numerical code for which various factions are ready to kill.

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) and his loyal men take on what they think is a routine assignment: a covert operation to invade the South American country of Vilena and overthrow its dictator. But, when they learn that the job will be a suicide mission, they must choose redemption or the destruction of their brotherhood.

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone), Lee Christmas (Jason Statham) and the rest of the Expendables team reunite when Mr. Church (Bruce Willis) hires them for a seemingly easy job. But things go terribly wrong, compelling the mercenaries to seek revenge for a comrade's murder. With the odds against them, Barney and his team are hell-bent on payback and cut a path of destruction through opposing forces, only to encounter an unexpected threat: six pounds of weapons-grade plutonium.

programme.title: The Expendables 3
programme.desc: Years ago, Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) co-founded the Expendables with Conrad Stonebanks (Mel Gibson). After Stonebanks became an arms dealer, Ross was forced to kill him -- or so he thought. Now, Stonebanks is back and he's on a mission to end the Expendables. Ross decides that the way to fight old blood is with new blood, so he assembles a team of younger, faster, more tech-savvy recruits. The battle to topple Stonebanks becomes a clash of old-school methods vs. high-tech expertise.

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) and his loyal men take on what they think is a routine assignment: a covert operation to invade the South American country of Vilena and overthrow its dictator. But, when they learn that the job will be a suicide mission, they must choose redemption or the destruction of their brotherhood.

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone), Lee Christmas (Jason Statham) and the rest of the Expendables team reunite when Mr. Church (Bruce Willis) hires them for a seemingly easy job. But things go terribly wrong, compelling the mercenaries to seek revenge for a comrade's murder. With the odds against them, Barney and his team are hell-bent on payback and cut a path of destruction through opposing forces, only to encounter an unexpected threat: six pounds of weapons-grade plutonium.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, he's the culmination of decades of research, endowed with unprecedented strength, speed, stamina and intelligence. Known only as Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), his latest target is a corporation that plans to unlock the secret of his past to create an army of killers even more powerful than him. With help from a young woman, the elite assassin confronts revelations about his own origins in an epic battle with his deadliest foe.

programme.title: The Alligator People
programme.desc: Newly married nurse Joyce Webster (Beverly Garland) doesn't know what to think when her husband, Paul (Richard Crane), disappears during a train ride. She hires private investigators and eventually tracks him to an old bayou plantation, where the owner (Frieda Inescort) insists she's never heard of Paul. Joyce sticks around anyway and soon learns that local doctor Mark Sinclair (George Macready) has been using a life-altering alligator serum on the town's residents, and that Paul is among them.

programme.title: Devils of Darkness
programme.desc: One British tourist (William Sylvester) rescues another (Tracy Reed) from Count Sinistre (Hubert Noël), vampire artist of Brittany.

programme.title: Race With the Devil
programme.desc: Roger (Peter Fonda), his friend Frank (Warren Oates), and their wives (Lara Parker, Loretta Swit) are heading from San Antonio to the wilderness of rural Texas for some off-road motocross. What they find instead is a Satanic cult sacrifice, and they are unfortunate enough to be caught observing the ritual. Naturally, this doesn't sit too well with the cult members. Now Roger and Frank are on the run from what is apparently a very sizable Texan Satanist community.

programme.title: Eyewitness
programme.desc: New York City custodian Daryll Deever (William Hurt) is a big fan of local news reporter Tony Sokolow (Sigourney Weaver), so he is intrigued when she shows up to cover a story at his workplace. There's been a murder in the office building, and Tony suspects that Daryll may have insight into the crime, a notion that he furthers to stay close to her. However, when those behind the killing begin to think that Daryll really knows something, they target both him and Tony to keep their secrets hidden.

programme.title: Cleopatra
programme.desc: "Cleopatra" is a lengthy, sprawling, spectacular love story, helmed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz, depicting Cleopatra's manipulation of Julius Caesar and Marc Antony in her ill-fated attempt to save the Egyptian empire. This threesome in one of the most famous and gloriously powerful love triangles ever to be captured on film.

programme.title: The Expendables 3
programme.desc: Years ago, Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) co-founded the Expendables with Conrad Stonebanks (Mel Gibson). After Stonebanks became an arms dealer, Ross was forced to kill him -- or so he thought. Now, Stonebanks is back and he's on a mission to end the Expendables. Ross decides that the way to fight old blood is with new blood, so he assembles a team of younger, faster, more tech-savvy recruits. The battle to topple Stonebanks becomes a clash of old-school methods vs. high-tech expertise.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain (Idris Elba), the last Gunslinger, is locked in an eternal battle with Walter O'Dim (Matthew McConaughey), also known as the Man in Black. The Gunslinger must prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together. With the fate of worlds at stake, two men collide in the ultimate battle between good and evil.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: The future of civilization rests in the fate of the One Ring, which has been lost for centuries. Powerful forces are unrelenting in their search for it. But fate has placed it in the hands of a young Hobbit named Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood), who inherits the Ring and steps into legend. A daunting task lies ahead for Frodo when he becomes the Ringbearer - to destroy the One Ring in the fires of Mount Doom where it was forged.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: The future of civilization rests in the fate of the One Ring, which has been lost for centuries. Powerful forces are unrelenting in their search for it. But fate has placed it in the hands of a young Hobbit named Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood), who inherits the Ring and steps into legend. A daunting task lies ahead for Frodo when he becomes the Ringbearer - to destroy the One Ring in the fires of Mount Doom where it was forged.

programme.title: Race With the Devil
